f1c9d6c7-cbed-4aca-b194-b1e5e50353b3.description: Graduates of the Hudson Coach Certification Program have successfully completed an intensive 8-month coach training program. These graduates have learned the theories and concepts that inform the field of coaching with an emphasis on Self-as-Coach and cultivating one's internal landscape. Graduates know and demonstrate use of the Hudson Coaching Methodology and ICF coaching competencies such as active listening, evoking awareness, and cultivating trust and safety.
f1c9d6c7-cbed-4aca-b194-b1e5e50353b3.name: Hudson Coach Certification Program

issuer.summary: issued by Hudson Institute of Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in various learning modalities consisting of presentations on theory, skill-building exercises, supervised peer groups, coaching practice sessions, planning sessions, case studies, and application presentations with analyses and critiques.
Completion of the required hours for coaching provided and coaching received from a certified professional coach.
Completion of a comprehensive Learning Portfolio containing the learnings and development over the 8-month journey.
Completion of a written review and oral exam as the capstone of the learning journey.

c7f77ed9-5ea8-4fc7-9d51-5516c06fddfc.description: With the Manager as Coach (MaC) badge, earners have learned to engage, build action plans, and sustain impact within FMI. Through a 3-day workshop and two 90-minute Coaching Clinics, they have learned when to coach, how to initiate and engage in a coaching conversation, and how to develop people through coaching.
c7f77ed9-5ea8-4fc7-9d51-5516c06fddfc.name: FMI Manager as Coach

issuer.summary: issued by Hudson Institute of Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Hudson Institute of Coaching full (8 hour) Spot Coach program by attending 3 live sessions, 2 90-minute coaching clinics, and completing self-paced learning.

e8e13f18-0cda-4abc-aaad-5fd560eb0cb7.description: Wiser is a scalable leadership coaching platform that makes best-in-class coaching accessible to your next generation of leaders. With this Wiser badge, earners have participated in a three-month long practice to create sustained behavior change with a combination of world-class coaches & self-guided work.
e8e13f18-0cda-4abc-aaad-5fd560eb0cb7.name: Wiser

issuer.summary: issued by Hudson Institute of Coaching

alignments.name: Wiser
alignments.description: Wiser is a scalable leadership coaching platform that makes best-in-class coaching accessible to your next generation of leaders.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Wiser's program by completing three modules and attending three live coaching sessions.

654de5af-2c2c-4bd0-a4f9-2fb2ca73d633.description: With the Spot Coaching™ approach badge, earners have learned to engage, build action plans, and sustain impact within their organizations. They have learned how to bring coaching into everyday leadership, when to coach, how to initiate and engage in a coaching conversation, how to provide ongoing and timely feedback, and how to accelerate the development of their teams.
654de5af-2c2c-4bd0-a4f9-2fb2ca73d633.name: AWS - Hudson Spot Coaching™

a992b9f5-1574-49f8-8f5c-8d356f8ee27b.description: Through The Coaching Unlock, individuals contribute to the transformation of BCG’s performance culture by being effective people managers who coach their employees to maximize their performance, development, and growth and reach their career aspirations. By creating this coaching culture, people managers focus on growing and nurturing talent to deliver key results, strengthen leadership capacities, increase retention, and deepen engagement.
a992b9f5-1574-49f8-8f5c-8d356f8ee27b.name: BCG's The Coaching Unlock - Hudson Institute of Coaching
